step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed and focus on maintaining good posture.
Nice job stretching your arm overhead. Try to open your fingers a bit wider to maximize the stretch.
You're making a good fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to inhale deeply as you tighten your muscles.
Great extension! As you exhale, focus on a smooth, controlled return to the starting position.
Excellent finish to the first rep. Ensure your arms are fully extended overhead.
Second rep starting strong! Maintain that comfortable seated or standing position.
Good overhead stretch. Keep those fingers spread wide and focus on the upward reach.
You're effectively making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to breathe in as you engage your muscles.
Excellent control on the way down. Exhale fully and relax your arms.
Fantastic job completing the second rep! Your movements show good form and control.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers spread wide when reaching overhead and focus on a smooth inhale as you make a fist and exhale as you relax. Keep up the good work!
